name: Detroit D Heart Decal
description:
The decal is cut from premium matte finish vinyl, all made in the USA. Apply this decal to any smooth surface including car windows, laptop, walls, glass, wood, tile, mirror, etc. The vinyl is removable but not reusable. It peels cleanly off of the surface but cannot be re-applied elsewhere once peeled.

Show love for Detroit and DMA when rocking this decal on your car <3

Size 3.5x 3 inches

name: Old English D Car Decal

name: Michigan State Cookie Cutter
description:
Constructed of tinplate steel with one rolled edge and one cutting edge.

Upper section 1.25 x 3.5 x 1 inches
Lower section 2 x 3 x 1 inches

Please note: State measurements are approximate because most states are irregular. Our state cutters are not proportional to each other so check the measurements carefully.

Made for cookies but great for crafts also.

name: Detroit D Water Bottle
description:
FINALLY AN AFFORDABLE CUSTOM DETROIT WATER BOTTLE THAT'S NOT 35.00!!

After many test ourselves, we believe these to be dishwasher safe. However, to get more life out of your water bottle, we recommend hand washing in mild warm water.

Shipping for this item may take over 7 days.

name: Michigan is Home Necklace
description:
Scrabble Pendant Jewelry is fun, affordable, & make a unique gift idea for any occasion. Excellent Quality Guaranteed. Each pendant is wonderfully hand crafted to ensure a high quality product.


Graphic Image decoupaged onto reclaimed Scrabble tile
Non-toxic glaze for a glass-like finish
Sterling silver plated bail added
Measures approx. .75" x .75"
THIS IS NOT recommended for younger children as it poses a choking hazard.
This pendant is NOT completely waterproof and should not be worn when swimming or bathing.
Please keep in mind that colors may differ from your actual pendant due to your monitor settings.
Each necklace includes a 24 inch silver ball chain.

name: Michigan Pride Beer Glass
description:
We love our home state, do you? No matter where you go do you feel that ache in your heart for good ol' Michigan? Take this beer glass wherever you go and show love for your state.


After many test ourselves, we believe these to be dishwasher safe. However, to get more life out of your water bottle, we recommend hand washing in mild warm water.

Shipping for this item may take over 7 days.

name: Small Detroit D Decal
description:
Who doesn't know what the old english Detroit D is? This Detroit D decal is the white (or whatever color you choose) part of the image only, does not come with a grey background. This vinyl will last up to 6 years outdoors.

Show love for Detroit and DMA when rocking this decal on your car <3

Decal will be about 3" tall.
